name: You have requested changes
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

Your comments about the application ((isDivorce??for divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership)) have been sent to your ((partner)). You will receive an email when they have updated the information, and you will be able to review it again.

A joint application ((isDivorce??for divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership)) cannot be submitted until you both agree on the information.

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Application ((isDivorce??for divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership)): you have requested changes
